title: U.S. Stocks Climb Back as Investors Digest Fed Rate Cut
text:
U.S. stocks wobbled, then staged a late-session rebound Wednesday after the Federal Reserve lowered interest rates but signaled a divided outlook for the rest of the year.

Trading was volatile in the two hours after the Fed’s rate decision. Stock selling initially accelerated, sending the Dow Jones Industrial Average down more than 200 points, after the Fed’s policy statement showed officials weren’t in agreement about the prospect of further rate cuts in 2019. That may have come as a disappointment to investors who had been...
description: U.S. stocks wobbled, then staged a late-session rebound after the Federal Reserve lowered interest rates but signaled a divided outlook for the rest of the year.
